entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 10:36 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:36 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to periods of freezing rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 10:36 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
